website_summaries.verdict: A superb MacBook Pro case that delivers an unmatched blend of style and function.
pros: Delivers seamless access to all MacBook Pro buttons and ports
Snap-on design guarantees you can instantly attach the case to your MacBook Pro
Sold in a broad range of eye-catching colors
Comes with a keyboard cover and screen protector
cons: Keyboard cover is flimsy and cheap

customer_reviews.title: VERY cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: VERY cheap quality. The case easily scratched as soon as I put it on, the keyboard cover was flimsy (and kind of bent), and when I went to put on the screen protector with the applicator card that was provided it actually scratched the screen protector! I was very disappointed in this product because it did not protect my laptop at all.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyJ

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My case got here really fast and it was great! The finish is matte and not glossy at all which was what I wanted. The Apple logo can't be seen unless the computer is on. I would definitely purchase this again! Oh, and it fits like a glove. As for the screen protector I wasn't a big fan because of the reflection but I really didn't really care for it at all when ordering. (MacBook with Retina)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case does not fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is not a perfect fit like the others I’ve had. The bottom cover does not snap on all the way. The two prongs in the bottom back keeps the case from fitting perfectly. The seller asked to re-try putting the case on and off but this did not fix the problem. No further contact from the seller. The color is beautiful and as described. I wish it fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: YESSSS. I am in love with the color of this case! It's so cute, and I guess I'm in a definite pastel phase. ^_^ The case fits perfectly on my MacBook Pro. I LOVE that it comes with the foot sticker replacements. Those usually come off and I just have to live with the constant annoyance of an uneven laptop until I get another one. The keyboard cover is also super nice in that it's texture isn't too sticky and it just feels super nice. I also like that the package came with a screen protector, although I already have one on my screen, so now I have a bonus, haha. Overall a GREAT product, I am so satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love It, Review It, Rave About It!
customer_reviews.text: This Mosiso plastic hard shell case for my MacBook is sleek and absolutely beautiful. I love that it feels smooth and silky. The camel color is very clean and serene looking which is great. I am on my computer all the time and I dislike being irritated by my previous colored cases. This color provided me with a new clean and sleek look. It looks professional, subtle, and it is refreshing. The new key pad protector is just as beautiful. It even came with a screen protector which none of my previous cases came with. It fits perfectly on my MacBook unlike previous cases. Overall I give this product 5 stars. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Caliguy

customer_reviews.title: Case does not fit at all
customer_reviews.text: I am so frustrated!!!! I bought this case in the Camel color and it DID NOT fit my MacBook. I double checked the serial number and I am certain I bought the right case, but the top case does not fit correctly. And it is so hard to take off, my hands got all red from trying to take the case off. I even purchased this twice since I thought the first was a defect BUT BOTH DIDN'T FIT. I’m so disappointed, I don’t recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend it. Look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: I like the the whole protection thing especially the keyboard cover. The thing that I dont like is that the cover started chipping away slowly and got me by surprise that it was doing that. I honestly just had it stored my apple laptop with this cover then it chipped firstly at the corners on the back then created up to the sides but it's still clinging to the laptop. Thought it will last me a good time but I guessed wrong. There you have it my review...buy it or not....its up to you.....would I recommend it....I'd say look somewhere else at another similar product. Cheers. US Veteran
customer_reviews.author: JusticeLeague

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and protection but...
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice to have if your looking for a temporary case. The color pops. The soft like texture is a nice added touch as well. But its not the nicest case you could buy... The edges of this case are extremely ridged and sharp. If I wasn't more aware I would cut myself on it. It's not very comfortable to rest you forearms on. The keyboard protector is a nice added bonus but it lifts a bit when in use. So I don't know how protective that will be if or when I spill another on my keyboard. All in all, I've had this for about a month now and I will be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: JasJanee

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The case has a nice feel to it and looks great on my MacBook with very slight imperfections with the fit. At fist, I thought the bottom piece was completely wrong because it doesn't fully cover, but other case brands for my model MacBook also fit the same way, so I think this is how it's supposed to look. The top cover also does not completely fit as seen in the attached photos. I'm not sure of this is on purpose as to not interfere with closing the laptop. All in all, I'm happy with it as it serves the purpose for which I bought it: to attach stickers without ruining my computer.
customer_reviews.author: O. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Received a completely damaged product
customer_reviews.text: When I received my case the box it came in was undamaged and perfectly fine. I wish I could say the same for the product. The top case has scratches that go deep into the plastic all over it. The bottom case was even worse. It was completely broken in two different places, and also had the same scratches the top piece had. I ordered something else from amazon that came in the same box, and that item had nothing wrong with it, just the laptop case.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this case before in a different color, and it was wonderful, so I bought another, but in a different color. Absolutely LOVE the color, but the quality isn't nearly like my original. After having this for maybe a month, pieces of the case started cracking and breaking off. I would understand if this was a result of my being rough with the computer, but it stays in place on my desk 85% of the time. When transporting, I have another lined case that I put it in to keep it protected. The most "wear and tear" is when I open and close the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This computer case is great! It is inexpensive and high quality. I've purchased a few over the years and am thoroughly impressed. The only recommendation I would have is to order a color with a keyboard cover that is not clear; my clear one fits perfectly but it shows oil from my fingers very easily. This makes the keyboard look dirty, even after washing the cover and washing my hands before using it (pictures attached).
customer_reviews.author: Dani EscobarTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Tore off layer of my screen!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product until I went to take the screen protector off a couples months later. It took off the top layer of my screen!! I don’t know how much this will cost me to repair but save yourself and don’t purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item does not fit my MacBook Pro A1425 like it said it would in the description
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit my MacBook Pro A1425 like it said it would in the description. Neither the top nor the bottom fits - both have slight gaps that does not click all the way in. I've asked to return this product for a refund and they're telling me I have to wait for a month for this shipment to be picked up and 2-3 days after the item has been received to get my refund. I don't want to go out and drop off this product physically due to ongoing coronavirus situation so I'm stuck with this crap for a month and who knows how long to get my refund. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hamin Jeon

customer_reviews.title: I Like This MacBook Case
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write any reviews about the products I bought; however, I feel like I should change my habits. Whenever I wanna buy something online, I always go with the top rating products. I think to leave a correct review will help other people to make a wise decision on the right product. First I wanna say it is a very nice, well-made Macbook case with smooth touch feeling. Second, the price is not bad at all (kind of cheap compared to the one I saw at the BestBuy store) Third, when you carry your computer, you need to be a little little careful that it may fall out of your hands because of the slippy surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The case fits nicely on my laptop and does a good job of staying on and protecting my computer. I really like the way it looks and feels, and it was easy to use. Unfortunately I have already notices some cracks in the plastic around the edges (and I don't travel much with my computer). It still works great, but I am worried how long it will last. Update January 2018: The cracks have continued to not only get worse but are now showing up all over and the case is practically useless now. It's only one step away from falling apart. You get what you paid for, which is apparently only 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: J5Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but case pops off too easily
customer_reviews.text: Case is nice, but it pops off all the time especially when going through airport security and the MacBook has to be taken out of my briefcase and placed in the bin; really inconvenient to say the least; although it took some getting used to at first, the keyboard cover is pretty good and sits well on the keyboard after a few days; I did not use the screen protector as it appears to be something that would interfere with viewing the screen; overall a three stars rating.
customer_reviews.author: No1Nole

customer_reviews.title: Great protection at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The set came promptly and was very easy to install. Great price, and the color is true to the picture. The shell snapped into place easily and fits snugly. I especially like the feel of the keyboard protector (although the blue is a slightly different shade than the shell.) The keyboard protector seemed to instantly meld onto my laptop, and the keys have a soft feel to them now, as if I had put talcum powder on the keyboard. The screen protector was easy to install as well. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: doesn't exactly fit but still love it (UPDATE)
customer_reviews.text: i have an early 2013 13 inch macbook pro, retina and the bottom of the case doesn't quite clip in all the way (requires some force) but the case still looks good. i bought it in the color black and it is somewhat see through but i dont mind bc i still get to showcase my sticker collection lol. update: it's been a few months and the bottom of the case has now broken due to it not fitting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This case cuts my wrists
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the edges are very sharp. I have tried to figure out how to smooth it out, because I'm cheap and I care about the environment, but there doesn't seem to be any fixing this durable sucker. It is probably fine for someone who doesn't type much - or has a separate keyboard that they use. But if you type, and you carry your laptop with you to work anywhere (like from the living room to your bedroom for a change of scene in pandemic mode) do not buy this case!
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I had a case like this on my MacBook Pro since I bought it in 2013. It was getting old looking and I wanted a different color. This case is an identical model at $10 less than the original and comes with a screen protector as well as a keyboard protector that you can't even tell is there. Very easy to install and looks great! It was a little tricky getting the old top half of the cover off, but I managed with a little finesse and persistence.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: The color, fit, and return/exchange policy makes me sad
customer_reviews.text: The color of this case is not what I expected. I was thinking of a lighter more towards gold color, but it seems darker than the picture. I should've just gotten the gold. When I went to return or even exchange it, I found out those are not options. I'm just really sad. It also doesn't fit my computer or snap all the way. I am really disappointed in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Martin

customer_reviews.title: Got the rose quartz and it is a perfect matte light pink color
customer_reviews.text: The case is exactly as pictured. Got the rose quartz and it is a perfect matte light pink color. The only thing that I didn't really like about it was I wish it fit a little more snug. It doesn't slide or anything, but I've had an iIncase hardshell case for my macbook before and this case is definitely not as well fitting. However, it is a quarter of the price so I'm happy. The keyboard cover sucks, but all keyboard covers suck so don't get your hopes up. Overall, I am extremely please with my purchase and plan to get this cover in a few more colors :-)! Hope this review helped.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Lassley

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time I purchased this product it is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of this brand that I buy. The 1st 1 lasted like 2 and a 1/2 years and got real scuffed up so it protected my Mac book well. This 1 had a hairline scratch on the top cover, but that's fine barely visible. You get lots of extra stuff like a screen Plastic cover and a keyboard cover and I recall something else. Just the shell alone is worth it not sure if I use the other items. You cannot beat the price either
customer_reviews.author: Truth and nothing but ...

customer_reviews.title: The hard case fits like a glove and makes it easier for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the smartest inexpensive purchases I made. The hard case fits like a glove and makes it easier for me to grasp my laptop, and it protects it! I am an artist and I use oil paint and constantly smudging my laptop. Not anymore - So easy to clean it. Oh, and sometimes I drop my paintbrush and it falls on my laptop. Having the keyboard cover and the screen cover protects it and keeps me from going hysterical. Almost impossible to keep my laptop totally clean when painting. Life just got better and no more worries. HIGHLY recommend the laptop cover...wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My computer looks like a rockstar
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at this cover. The case was true to color and very thick. I feel really confident using this case on my computer. The sides are curved so there are no sharp edges and it protects everything that should be protected. I love the keyboard cover. It buffers the click sound from the keys and does not hinder the computer from closing. Makes the computer look very nice. It comes with a screen protector which is awesome. Never thought I needed one until I had it and it makes a difference when handling the screen and fingerprints. Came fast and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kmsd75

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case a few years ago and it held up pretty good for about 2-3 years before it started to crack from my own fault. I ordered another one in January to replace the one I used for a few years. The first week I put the new one on it started to shed it's "skin" all over and it has no cracked in half. This is not from normal wear and tear, it's just not high quality. My first case did not do this so I'm confused as to why the products are so different.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kruger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CASE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case, especially the price. I was afraid it was going to be flimsy and low quality with it being such a low price, but i was totally wrong. The color is perfect, finish is matte and slip proof. The only issue i have is with the keyboard cover, the letters and numbers are slightly off when looking closely. But hey, it was free, so not a deal breaker. Case also came with a free screen protector, have not used it though. Overall GREAT purchase, would recommend to anyone looking for a high quality, low price case.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Mascorro

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cover for a little over 3 weeks and the plastic has already started peeling off. I only use my macbook occasionally after work, so it's not like the cover has been exposed to heavy use. Before purchasing this cover I was using another brand that lasted forever, the only reason I replaced it is because the other one broke after I dropped it. This cover does fit well, but I'm very disappointed with the quality of the product. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Came scratched. Not the best quality. This is the second I’ve ordered. I ordered a green one first that I loved, but the matte finish came off at the corners pretty quickly, so I decided to try the clear that had a glossy finish. No issues with the finish coming off but it came with scratches on top and one of the corners has a sharp edge I had to file down because it would scratch me when I tried to type on my keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: LG4

customer_reviews.title: It looks like the machine spilled some white ink on the keyboard ...
customer_reviews.text: Too many small cosmetic flaws. I am returning it. It looks like the machine spilled some white ink on the keyboard cover, impossible to get off. The case was a beautiful shade of periwinkle, but there were rough patches on the top, a small scratch, as well as little marks and dots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my A1502 13"
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this case before (in blue) and I've had it for about 2 years and is now worn out so I decided to buy it again, but in pink. I don't know if it's just the rose quartz color that has an issue but this is my 2nd time ordering it and still the same problem!! about a centimeter too small for the top part!! BOTH TIMES DID NOT FIT // FIT THE SAME WAY !! Very frustrating.. will be ordering from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Rivera

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this case. I bought Serenity blue three years ago when I first started college. I purchased mint green in August of 2018 because I wanted to change things up. The case is AMAZING quality. Never once did it break, chip, or look dirty. The case has saved my computer from getting any scratches, dents, or crumbs in the keyboard. I HIGHLY recommend this product and if you like to change things up like I do buy multiple colors they are cheap enough. I’m a permanent customer! Also, I have gotten several compliments on both color cases from my classmates. I hope this review helps make your decision to purchase this case even easier. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, adds extra grip so when I'm carrying it around, I'm less worried about dropping it. The only thing I don't like about the case is that fingerprints show up very easily on the surface. They do wipe off really well with electronics wipes. The keyboard cover is better than the other two covers that I've tried in the past, it has very little resistance and doesn't slow typing down at all. I haven't tried the screen protector yet, honestly I'm a little nervous putting it on over such a large surface. Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice But Not So Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice color however, over the past three months since I've have this laptop cover it has begun to crack and the keyboard cover does not stick to the keyboard. I take a lot of my pride in all my belongings, I do not throw my laptop, slam, toss or anything of that nature. These crack literally came out of nowhere. If you are looking for something that will last then this is DEFINITELY NOT IT. I am currently back online searching for something that will. SN: The top cover for the most part has remained in tack however the bottom has not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tedra

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I was obviously really skeptical about buying something like this online. I wondered if the quality would be good and if I would be full of regret after buying this. But very happily, I and my sister are VERY pleased with this product! The shell snaps on, the screen protector is the perfect size and the keyboard cover works well! Very happy with the color too. Totally worth every penny. You will not find a better deal. Seriously, I've tried looking and read ALOT of reviews before I went with this seller. Quality goods. Ours are not shiny though. We got matte. And I personally love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, with minor caveats.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m satisfied. Adds a surprising amount of weight, and seems to add to heat retention. That said, I’ve been removing the bottom to keep fan usage, hence battery drain, to a minimum. I like the keyboard cover, though it may be adding to heat retention as well. Did not use screen protector, didn’t need it. Main reason for purchase was to protect from scratches going in and out of my zippered laptop bag. For that, it’s great. Also, looks good. Mine is the dark grey color. Shipped quick and all seems as described. Some mildly sharp edges can be fixed with a touch from a fine sandpaper or emory board.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Read the gobblygook info carefully.
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault. I am not that computer savvy and thought I was ordering something that would fit my 13" MacBook Pro . It doesn't. I went back and tried to find out where I went wrong and my eyes are crossing from all that gobblygook. I'll be sending it back and won't order from this company again. Apparently I'm not computer savvy enough to rate as a happy customer of Mosiso.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this case
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this case. I dropped my MacBook onto a tile floor a few days ago. The case did crack slightly, but there was no damage to the computer at all. This case also comes with a screen protector and keyboard cover, which is very helpful because I travel with my computer a lot. There are small scratches on the case and screen protector, but nothing at all on the computer. I definitely recommend spending a little extra money to get this case. It will save you from having to repair damages later and will keep your computer in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I thought the keyboard cover was dirty but apparently it was DEGRADING which is worse and leaving an oily substance on the keys. Would not recommend, especially since keyboard replacement would be extremely expensive. I’ve only had it a couple weeks but it’s already a bit banged up and the color has come off in places. The keyboard cover is already dirty :/ also it’s closer to rose gold than gold. HOWEVER it’s still pretty nice and protecting
customer_reviews.author: I.S.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Snaps on well and the screen protector is an added bonus. For the price, this product does what you need it to do if you take care of your MacBook. The product isn't going to provide a lot of protection if you drop your mac, but it will keep the outside free from scratches and gunk. Note that the back (hinged) side of the mac has little protection from this shell (else it would interfere with the operation of the henge).
customer_reviews.author: MA_GA

customer_reviews.title: Works, happy with the appearance except for a chipped corner
customer_reviews.text: The case is fine in principle, but it came with a piece of the corner broken off. This doesn't prevent it clipping to the laptop, and I don't have the energy to once again interact with a seller over poor handling, storage or shipping. I shared the keyboard cover with a friend - it also seems to work - and I don't really need the screen protector that is hard to attach without bubbles or dust (in previous experience).
customer_reviews.author: Phages'R'Phun

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fits well on my late model 2012 macbook
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast! Looks great and fits well on my late model 2012 macbook. I did expect it to be more of a bright white. It's more of a putty white. Not a huge deal, but if you're looking for a bright shiny white, you might be disappointed. The key cover is great! The old one I had on this felt like typing in mud, if that makes sense. This one is really crisp and easy type on. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this case, I have bought it several times in a couple of colors. I am super rough with my computer and have cracked two of these cases in the four years I have owned my computer, but they are pretty durable and I love the soft touch that they have. I love that the set is for not only a cover, but a screen protector and a keyboard protector. For the price you can't beat it. Also must note that if you have oil on your fingers it will leave prints. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: LuluBazaar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This case has worked out great! The only thing that is like meh, if is you’re eating something greasy like fries or a burger while watching a movie, lol, then you close your computer, those greasy finger marks stay in there BUT! They’re easy to wipe off and no residue is left behind when using a wet wipe or disinfecting wipe. (Always dry excess moisture off the case) I also like the transparency to where you can see the lit Apple logo!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and protection
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, the plastic covering is very form-fitting. Quality plastic. Plenty of vent holes so the computer does not overheat. The keyboard cover changes the feel of the keyboard, naturally, but it is cheap insurance in the event of a spill. I dumped Coke on my MacBook and it cost me $750 to replace the keyboard, motherboard, etc. This is great prevention for such another accident like that for a reasonable price. Best part is that everything is removable in a moment's notice. (I did not choose to use the screen cover)
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: I love these--will keep buying!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second one in three years. They are great. I don't use the screen protector, but the keyboard skin and the outside shell are freaking awesome. They have a ton of great colors and the price is very reasonable. Bought once, bought again, and will buy in the future! (When I change from old broken one to new one, however, the top part of the cover (for the back of the screen) was really tough to get off.)
customer_reviews.author: SeaDrake

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro Plastic Case
customer_reviews.text: Since I was doing repairs on my laptop, I figured why not and finish it off with a new cover. Mosiso provides enough colors for their customers when it comes to this product. The delivery wasn't late, in fact it arrived sooner than expected (and I'm currently deployed in Afghanistan). The installation was incredibly easy and I've been using it ever since. Mosiso also provides a nice looking keyboard cover that doesn't negatively affect the ergonomic design of the MacBook Pro. Finally, a screen protector is provided but I didn't use it since I like the quality of retina display.
customer_reviews.author: David Bastidas

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good for price. The screen protector was a nice bonus, I got the same order when I first bought my macbook pro retina late 2013 for the shell and the keyboard cover. This shell this time around, came with thinner,more lightweight plastic which is a little more flimsy and less durable material but I figure will ultimately will last years like the last one before, it finally cracked . does the job .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E Maliksi

customer_reviews.title: Finish scratches off - really disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, with a few nice extras in the package [screen protector, keyboard pad] - however, after less than a month of use, the soft-touch finish is completely destroyed. All edges are scratched and chipping off. When we tried to remove it, it cracked. Really disappointing, as this was a gift. For reference, I purchased in Navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case, keyboard skin and, screen protector are the perfect additional to keeping your laptop safe and durable. I love how easy it was to install this case and it clips on. Fits perfectly like a glove and it will last a very long time. These cases and keyboard skins are great for keeping everything protected. Worth the price and 100% recommend to anyone on the goal or for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Do not use the keyboard cover!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the actual plastic case but the keyboard cover RUINED my Retina display. According the Apple website you cannot have keyboard covers on these types of laptops. The website even says it’ll ruin your display, which it did. I now have a keyboard imprint on my glass screen that cannot be wiped off, is is embedded forever. The only way to get rid of it is to replace my screen. Wish I would have known this before I purchased this and ruined my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank Goodness for This Case!
customer_reviews.text: Thank Goodness we had this case! We purchased this case for my daughter MacBook. We ordered the mint one by the way and it is really pretty! It's easy to use and looks great! Not long after putting it on her computer, she knocked a lit candle off of a shelf and wax went everywhere! Covering her MacBook!!!! Luckily she had the case on it and I was totally protected. The. Ass also survived the hot wax but has smudgy grease marks all over it from removing the candle wax. We will be ordering a new one for sure! Thanks for making such a great product in so many wonderful colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The cover was easy to put on; protects nicely. I don't use the keyboard cover altho it fits over the keys as it should and it does keep the keyboard clean. Rubber feet fall off right away. This is my third cover over the years and they wear well. Can't clean them so I replace them. I love the patterned ones. Good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C.

customer_reviews.title: A lot for little money compared to what is at the Apple store
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case has protected my MacBook a lot better then a case i have gotten from the Apple store and helped to protect it with being tossed around in my backpack. Not only does this product have the case, but they also have a scree protector and protective cover for the keyboard so that dirt or food crumbs don't get in-between the keys. The only thing that i would change about this product is that rubber laptop holders on the bottom case. They can easily come off since a sticky adhesive holds them on. I would highly recommend this product because you are getting a lot for your money and has been very durable for a busy mom/college student.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE SCREEN PROTECTOR
customer_reviews.text: Just got this package in the mail. The case is fine, just as expected but DON'T USE THE SCREEN PROTECTOR! Just tried to put mine on and it left a sticky residue on parts of my screen when I removed to try and readjust. I tried everything and it won't come off. I'm afraid I just ruined my retina display o_o. Beware of this! Case is fine but don't bother with the screen protector. Additionally, if anyone has any insight as to what happened Or how I might remedy this situation please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Baker Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and look
customer_reviews.text: Both the laptop case and keyboard cover are nice looking and protective. They both fit perfectly. After about 5-6 months I noticed a few small hairline cracks in the case. Reported this to the seller and as promised received a new case. The sellers commitment to total customer satisfaction is genuine and much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case
customer_reviews.text: This case is really nice and durable. I like the elevation buttons located at the bottom to keep airflow underneath my laptop. It also comes with a few extra Incase one of them pops off. The case is smooth and is true to color. The keyboard cover is also so nice. Mine fits fine except it creases up a tiny bit in one particular area near the space bar. However, I can deal with it. I love how the keyboard cover makes typing feel and sound. It’s not obnoxiously loud or difficult to type. Overall I think I’ll be purchasing a few other colors. I have no comment about the screen protector as I have not utilized it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: This case isn't bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This case isn't bad for the price. Although I purchased it on Prime day so I got it for $9.99. But the top of the case had a gash and the color wasn't as expected. I emailed customer service and they were really nice by offering to replace the top of the case of me. I wish I could've returned the full case and receive a different color but other than that the customer service was good.
customer_reviews.author: Acquisha Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover, very difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. I got the true clear version so my decal would show through. Easy install, top cover is extremely difficult to remove. I scratched it up a little removing it. But it still looks great! I did install the screen saver and the keyboard cover, though it's taking me some to time to get used to the keyboard cover.
customer_reviews.author: lilida

customer_reviews.title: Like dude, the whole point is to protect the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was the wrong color and they skimp on costs by having random cutouts on the edges of the screen backing part. Like dude, the whole point is to protect the whole computer especially the edges from getting ding'ed. You can't do that if your product doesn't actually cover it. Also had the screen protector on for all of a day and already peeling at the edges. I know they tend to be temperamental but I did have faith initially because it looked fine when I put it on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great...but the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Top snaps on great... the only flaw I have found is that when taking my computer out of its fabric bag, the bottom part of this clear case always slips off of the computer. I have almost dropped it a few times, luckily my grip on the top half was good. Great case, just be mindful if you are taking your laptop out of a book bag, purse, etc., vertically - it may slip!
customer_reviews.author: casei

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Color on Web Description
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the chartreuse case for my MacBook Air and the gray case for my MacBook Pro (work computer). I was super impressed with the green, but not the gray. From the picture, you can see that the gray is super see-through. I got it with the intention of 1) protecting the Mac (which it does) and 2) hiding that ugly “loaner” sticker (which it does not) The green case is fabulous, and obviously not hardly see-through at all. Giving 4/5 for inaccurate color on website description.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty light blue case
customer_reviews.text: My 7-yr-old case finally broke so I replaced it with this one. It was delivered quickly and was easy to install. the reason I gave it 4 stars for durability is that there are several moderately sharp edges that might catch. One hits right where my wrist rests when typing. I'm going to file it and see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: MamaG

customer_reviews.title: Great color and snaps on very easily
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the case (I got the deep teal one)! The picture refects the color very well. The keyboard cover stays on pretty well but I personally don't like the feel of it. It also doesn't quite line up with the lights on the computers keys. The cover also gets oily fingerprints on it if I don't clean it often. All in all a good case, but I don't use the keyboard cover anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the money. Not a perfect fit, but close.
customer_reviews.text: Got this cover for an A1425 Macbook. It looks good, and my daughter really likes it on her computer. The only negative is that the base portion is a fraction of a millimeter too small for the unit, so the front tabs aren't able to click into place. It's not really an issue since the case stays in place - it's just not a totally perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tigersbite

customer_reviews.title: This plastic case is a good fit and provides protection to corners and body from ...
customer_reviews.text: This plastic case is a good fit and provides protection to corners and body from drops, scratches etc. The body is brittle and corners developed cracks and then broke in 6 months. Now as two corners are broken, the bottom part does not stay in place and falls off. It was a good product as long as it lasted but not durable as it lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Pranshu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pink color, protects my Mac
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this case when it first arrived, but after about 6 months of use the rubber 'feet' on the bottom have been coming off. I would've super glued them back on, but now one is lost, which makes my laptop just a tiny bit wobbly on a hard surface. Wish the feet would've stayed put. Now I need to find something to glue in place of the 4 feet to level it out again.
customer_reviews.author: Living La Vida FL

customer_reviews.title: EDIT: Pretty sturdy case.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t vouch for the durability of this case yet because it’s only been two weeks, but it’s definitely very nice. Feels good, fits perfectly and gives me peace of mind. Hard to take off but you don’t need to take it off often enough for this to be an issue for me. Update: After using the case for a few months and a few drops in, the case has a couple cracks and scratches, picks up a lot of grease/oil/stains, and has lost almost all the feet. But my laptop is in exceptional condition so I’m only docking one star from the review as it is still on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: darling

customer_reviews.title: Camel color is nice, but case & keyboard cover don't match
customer_reviews.text: I got the camel color, which is pretty. The only thing is that the keyboard cover is not the same color as the case. The case is a little pinkish and the keyboard cover is more taupe/sandy. Also the edges of the bottom case that come up under your wrists as you type are a little scratchy. My previous case didn't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Best case for the money. The screen protector was easy to apply and durable (did not peel off after frequent use). I did not get much use out of the keyboard protector as it did not adhere to the keyboard and kept falling off (there was nothing to secure it with included in the packaging). After about the 5th time I just gave up. The case has a velvety feel and stayed securely in place. I upgraded to a new version of the MacBook Pro and immediately purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: While the case is good, it is not smudge proof. It will still get fingerprint stains and the screen protector is useless in essence because it doesnt fit the screen exactly. Even the keyboard cover takes some getting used to. Update: The case broke right around 6 months and it is not quite durable. The keyboard cover takes almost constantly typing on it for about a month to get used to. Poor product
customer_reviews.author: J. L. McInnis

customer_reviews.title: Even better than most pricier cases!
customer_reviews.text: The case and keyboard cover fit perfectly! The case is also the perfect texture to put stickers and the like on without worrying about them coming off. Also, this is just a minor detail, but there's a hole on the caps lock key to see if it's on or off. I wish this were standard of all keyboard covers. My only complaint is that part of the bottom shell of the case hits the top shell when you are opening the lid, which makes a clicking sound, but obviously that's super minor and probably won't happen enough to be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, great feel and sound minimizes typing
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Mac perfectly. The keyboard cover is one unit that is not adhesive but fits well. The screen protector was unexpected but works well. The covers really are super easy to snap on and truly protect the computer. Great purchase and minimizes the sound of typing, which is great. My only complaint would be that the keyboard cover allows no light through so at night, in my room, or in a dark lecture, I can't see the keys well. Aside from that one thing... it's a great purchase and highly durable. I've had this for about 5 months now and it is extremely easy to keep clean, comfortable, and minimizes sound.
customer_reviews.author: Judith P

customer_reviews.title: quality is inconsistent or has gone down
customer_reviews.text: second time ordering this case brand. first time the case and keyboard cover kit perfect, lasted a couple years of regular use. i replaced it because i wanted a different color and both the case and keyboard cover were getting worn. ordered a second case in a different color for the same laptop, this time the hard case didn't fit as well but wasn't worth returning. the hard case / keyboard cover have not held up for nearly as long. it's been about 6 months. time to order another...
customer_reviews.author: BHarken

customer_reviews.title: Key Board Cover Is The Only Thing That Fits.
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is a glossy clear, but it does have blue tint. The keyboard cover fits perfectly and it comes with four extra sticky dots that go under your case just in case one falls off. But as you can see, the case doesn’t fit entirely onto the laptop and the screen protector is lifted. The cut out for the camera isn’t correct either. Even if you try to force the laptop case to fit, it’s undoable. There’s a lot of open areas that the case doesn’t protect either.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: #1 CASE !
customer_reviews.text: By far the best case for my MacBook Pro Ive had. I've had a couple others that were thicker and the keyboard was not as easy to type on. The keyboard overlay that comes with this Mosiso hard case is by far my favorite yet. The case is easy to install and easy to remove, as is the keyboard. Theres even a screen protector included which is nice. The case itself is neither slippery or tacky nor does it leave fingerprints. I give this a definite recommend ! Especially, for the price, quality, design and ease of use, you won't find a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: KD Cash

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 years of light use
customer_reviews.text: For this price I guess you can't expect something to last forever. I have enjoyed this case, but it started falling apart this year and I will need to get another one. I don't even use or transport my laptop very often, if you do I might spend more for a sturdier case. All in all not a bad purchase for the price, but your macbook will outlive this case.
customer_reviews.author: Viva

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Gift for me sister. She states that it felt lighter and less bulky than her previous case (pro) and fit well. It came with screen protection and applicator which was nice. I like the sheerness and good color. First order had to be replaced as there was a small piece cracked. My sister also commented on 2nd package that some of the extras (screen protection) wasnt in the first package. The exchange was very quick and easy. No problems there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection and Great New Look for Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hard protective cases and the keyboard covers or so nice!! I like using the keyboard with cover on it although initially you have to get used to it. If you want to jazz up your laptop this is the way and you can change it frequently with complete ease. Also a great way to have your laptop distinguished from others if you live in house with several mac users with the same laptop!
customer_reviews.author: MaryMerry

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT EVEN WASTE YOUR TIME.
customer_reviews.text: You are better off using cardboard to cover your computer. As soon as I opened the box the color was all wrong and I didn't even need to touch it to know that the plastic was so cheap and thin that a child could snap it in half. It didn't even fit my MacBook, the bottom was way too small, by about half an inch and the top part was an inch too big.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Torres

customer_reviews.title: This is my fourth MOSISO case, but this one's not quite as good...
customer_reviews.text: I'm hard on my laptop case and I like to change colors, so I buy one every year or so. The past three I've gotten have been great, but the one I just ordered was clear, instead of a color, and the edges of the bottom piece are really rough. It's uncomfortable to rest my wrists on the computer because they rub uncomfortably against the edge. The clear is made from a different material, so maybe that's the reason, but I just don't like the clear as much.
customer_reviews.author: JBVile

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit stated model (A1425)
customer_reviews.text: The color is great but the bottom piece of the cover just does not fit at all. I’ve confirmed that I ordered the right case for my MacBook, it will just not go on. The top piece fits fine. Returning :( There are also no instructions, though it seems very straightforward and I have other cases that go on with no trouble from other brands. But if there’s a trick to it, I wouldn’t know.
customer_reviews.author: oukatie

customer_reviews.title: Second time around - not a charm?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another case from this brand as my other one (that I loved) lost two of the feet. I LOVED the color, feel, etc of that case and it held up great. However, the new one does not fit my laptop the same. The top piece was very difficult to get on (seems the sides are a little off) and the silver of my laptop shows on both sides. I’m worried about the durability of my new case - disappointed because I loved my other one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Low price for High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The color is adorable and super vibrant! I'm happy that it also came with a screen protector and the keyboard cover, definitely a great price for all products included! Very easy to put on, a little tricky to take off - but that is a perk, since I don't want my laptop slipping out of it's case! The hard case has a great texture, and it makes applying and removing stickers very easy! This product broke during moving into a new place - but I will definitely purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: samxlopes

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight and looks snappy
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a 2015 laptop that worked great but had a few dings in the case. Purchased this cover to keep it from getting more dings and to hide the old dings. Fits snuggly and a little tricky time remove but not a real problem. I liked the green color - nice to look at, and good grip material.
customer_reviews.author: MacMaven

customer_reviews.title: The bottom doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: The top cover fit perfectly, the keyboard cover is great. The bottom cover is too small and can't snap on. I have a MacBook mid 2014. Based on the description of the product, this should have fit. Correction: It fits. user error. Have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality out there
customer_reviews.text: I want my computer to be as protected as possible since I need to carry it around in my backpack all day long. The case has protected my computer very well, but as time passed by, there were several places in which the matte layer of the paint began to peel off. The case now looks very old and not cared for. Stains are very difficult to remove. It will protect your computer from bumps but it will definitively crack. My point of comparison is a Speck case which I had for almost 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Keylah Caterina

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a case for my computer for HOURS before biting the bullet and deciding on this one. I’m SO happy I did. I have ZERO issues with this case. The edges aren’t uncomfortable on my wrist (my main worry after looking at the reviews). It looks beautiful, seems super durable, and was super easy to install! The screen protector is also awesome and was super easy to install. All of that said, my favorite part is the keyboard cover. It lines up with my computer perfectly, it’s so cute, it dampens my typing sounds, and it keeps my keyboard clean! Amazing value for all of these amazing items!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Far Superior to the more expensive brands!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a different brand that cost three times as much and it cracked within a month. I contacted them and they replaced it. That one cracked about 3 months later. It was never dropped, just pulled in an out of my briefcase. They refused to replace again so I purchased this one. All I can say is save your money and BUY THIS ONE!!! Far superior quality and more durable. I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CryGonz61617

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by how great the quality was. The keyboard cover and case matched perfectly. The case has a great matt feel and look. It also is very sturdy (I have bought two 50$ cases before this one from a store, and this feel stronger then those.) The screen protector was the only thing that I didn't like as much. It was difficult to put on, and did not fit my screen right. However, it does not give any different look to the screen when lit. Otherwise, great product and bundle!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordred the 13 inch but the product did not fit our macbook though the description said it would fit that model. It was too small, so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: IK13

customer_reviews.title: Top cover is a tiny bit too small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a case from Mosiso a few years back and it was time for a replacement. They honestly last a few years before the matte finish begins to peel. I purchased the olive case and was disappointed to see that it was just a smidge too small. This was the same model I bought a few years back which had fit perfectly. You’ll notice how the top cover on one side will come down all the way unlike the other side. Other than this mild little thing, the color and durability of these cases are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: It felt like I was going to break this case as I was trying to open the packaging. I felt the color may have not been entirely what I wanted it to be, BUT it grew on me. Once I figured out how to put the case on, it fit pretty well where my laptop was protected and still lightweight. The case feels sleek, and I never knew I wanted a screen protecter until now. I'm definitely more satisfied with this product than I was at first impression. (: the case seems to almost slide off my laptop (13'' macbook pro retina year 2015) but it hasn't broke and I think it'll be okay as long as I'm careful.
customer_reviews.author: Dafjamz

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, simple clear case, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Fits perfectly, stays clear and hasn't stained from use for the few months I've had it. Hard cover is great in case you hit your laptop on the side or slip up, and that happens a lot with me. You can still fit sticker designs on your laptop on top and have them show through, as well as the apple light. Minor issue is the ventilation at times, the fan flares up, and the sticky rubber pieces on the bottom come off after a while. Not a huge problem. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Not an accurate product description.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my daughters Mac book at all. We were then unable to return because she just gave it to her as a gift and was just past the deadline. Unacceptable. Product description is not accurate. Not a good company.
customer_reviews.author: Blackdoghoxie

customer_reviews.title: Just like the other one.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one knowing what I was getting it’s really nice and comes with everything you need for a case even a screen protector and a couple extra rubber things for the bottom grip. But I thought I ordered black so I had to return it and get the black one.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Allam

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting & good quality case, but screen protector is useless
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hard case I've purchased from this brand (bought the same one in a different color 3 years ago) and I am very happy with the durability, protection, and overall quality for the price. I bought a new one due to some minor cracks in the bottom piece and simply the desire for a new color. The new case and keyboard cover are of great quality, but the screen protector is unusable. The "masks" that protect the protector and keep the sticky side sticky were peeling off, so it would not stick to my screen. The screen protector from my last order is still in fine condition, so I will continue using that one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: If fit perfectly on my Macbook and was exactly as expected. The keyboard cover has a slightly rubbery feel but stays in place perfectly and hasn't affected my typing at all. It is a definite bonus and will help prevent my kids from spilling anything into the keyboard. I'll be purchasing one for my wife's macbook air soon!
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case so much! I received the camel color and It is true to its color! I love that it came with the keyboard cover and screen protector. I saw some reviews saying the screen cover was difficult to put on and created air bubbles. This bundle does come with the card that removes air bubbles during the placement. I suggest taking your time putting on the screen protector, and really making sure there are no air bubbles. Mine is on with no issues. The only complaint I have is that because of the matte look and the light color, sometimes smudges easily show up on the case. But this is a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: FY

product_meta.title: MOSISO Case Only Compatible with Older Version MacBook Pro Retina 13 inch (Models: A1502 & A1425) (Release 2015 - end 2012), Plastic Hard Shell Case & Keyboard Cover & Screen Protector, Rose Quartz
feature_bullets: The case was designed ONLY to be compatible with Older Version MacBook Pro Retina 13 Inch (Models: A1502 & A1425), Release 2015 / 2014 / 2013 / end 2012, so please kindly check the model number "A1xxx" on the back of the MacBook before your purchase, make sure you choose the exact same model number as the listing title stated "A1502" or "A1425".
WARNING: This case is NOT compatible with other model MacBooks.
NO Cut Out design, transparency is different from color to color. Fully vented for safe heat disbursement, fully access to all buttons and features.
Case Dimension: 12.5 x 8.7 x 0.9 inch, the diagonal length of the case is 15 inch, the Older Version MacBook Pro 13 inch with Retina Display Dimension: 12.35 x 8.62 x 0.71 inch.
Including 1 matching color keyboard cover & 1 screen protector to protect your MacBook keyboard & screen against spills and contaminates. MOSISO 1 year warranty on case, keyboard cover.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars7,628 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
